segments.text: You look so tan and healthy !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I just got back from summer camp .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I got to try so many things for the first time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went sailing , fishing , and horseback riding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The counselors were so nice too . It was the best summer ever . Except for all those mosquitoes !
segments.speaker: S2
